title: Aloha King Elvis
description:

title: American Roulette
description: American Roulette features a ball, a wheel and numbers colored black and red and marked from 1to 36. There is also one green slot numbered 0. This variation of roulette features two zeropockets: 0 and 00 (as opposed to the European variant with only 0) which increases the house' sadvantage on even money bets. A player can bet on any single number or the range or numbers,segments of the field like columns and dozens and also odd/even, black/red and low/high numbersthat are called "even money" bets.

It's all about the nature and culture of the powerful tribe: stone cut reels, forestsand mountains of Mexico in the background, and Indian masks depicting gods and warriors. title: Baccarat
description: The game enjoys great popularity all over the world's brick-and-mortar casinos, especially in Macau, and we are happy to bring the atmosphere right on your device wherever you are now.The rules are quite straightforward: collect a hand of value as close to 9 as possible. Aces count 1, while faces and tens 0. The games opposes player to banker, and they both are dealt two cards each. The one who approaches 9 closer than the opponent wins. In certain cases, a third card can be dealt.In Baccarat by Bgaming you will see only what is required to concentrate on your luck.The gameplay is smooth and relaxing, dimmed music and background voices immerse you into the atmosphere of a gambling house and the dealer's slight accent hints you are somewhere in Asia.

title: Bitcoin Million
description: Bitcoin Million will definitely shower you with fabulous winnings. title: Multihand Blackjack Pro
description: Blackjack Pro is a variation of Blackjack with increased payout ratio and one of the lowest houseedges for any casino game. It originates from the Las Vegas Strip set of rules from in Las Vegascasinos back in the 1970s.This one is played with 6 decks, each with a card count of 52. The player can make a prior bonusbet before any cards are dealt. Should any of the cards be a Jack, the player can significantlymultiply their Bet winnings, regardless of the outcome of the regular game. Look out for acombination of Two Jacks of Spades to get a Bet multiplier of x100.Worth mentioning are the Double and Split features. You can split your hand up to 3 hands. Dealeralways stands on soft or hard 17. A tie results in a Push and your hand is returned.This Las Vegas version of the game definitely deserves the attention of savvy players or just thoseseeking additional thrills from more bets per round!

title: Blackjack Surrender
description: Blackjack Surrender permits to play it safe on most occasions: whether you have been dealt a tricky hand or are simply unsure of the outcome, you can still gain back half of the initial bet, leaving the other half to the House. In other words, the rules allow the player to forfeit their hand early on, while still retaining a part of the bet. This opens the door for new betting strategies and a different approach to the game on the whole.Much to the enjoyment of returning players the Split and Double features are available. Not straying far from tradition, the dealer receives one card face up, the other face down. A player can face the house with up to 3 hands. Expect a regular game to payout 1 to 1, while a Blackjack combinations pays 3 to 2. Whether you are honing your skills for the bigger game or are new to blackjack in general, this one is a must to try!

title: Caribbean Poker
description: Don't let a fancy name confuse you if you're familiar with the fundamentals of stud poker, you'll get the hang of this poker variant easily!In the Caribbean Poker you place a bet on the circle space called Ante with an opportunity to Raise(to set a bet twice as size of Ante) or Fold (therefore, to lose the bet) later on. You can see all fivecards at once at your side, while the Dealer shows one of theirs. As always in our games, the full setof rules is at a single clic's length.Playing poker against the Dealer in online casinos has its advantage: you don't have to figure outeveryone else's strategy or bluffing. Instead, you can fully focus on the balanced rules and gameplayof this version of poker. Alternatively, you can easily switch to other sharp-looking BGAMING pokergames and experience poker from a different angle.Now sit down at the Caribbean Poker table with the confidence of a pro-player we got your backwith a comfortable chair!

title: Casino Hold`em
description: There can never be an enjoyable casino experience without a game of poker. Some traditionalrules for those standing firmly on their feet  here we've got them.In the beginning of each round you are dealt with two cards that will form the hand incombination with the five cards on the table. The ultimate goal is collecting the best 5-cardhand. Achieve this goal with Call or test your luck and skill in another round by Fold.The game will take into consideration the two cards on your hand and the three flop cards,and calculate the best winning combination. To take a look at the paytables of the winninghands, check the rules inside the game.Furthermore, you can set an additional bonus AA bet on the side. In order to collect thegenerous AA bonus, you will need to have at least a pair of Aces or higher at your hand. Bestof luck!

title: Double Exposure
description: As the name of the game suggests, Double Exposure refers to a modified version of blackjackwherein the Dealer's cards are visible from the get go. With such an upper hand for the Player, theDealer is able to compensate by other means.Though the advantage is in favour of the player in terms of adapting their strategy from the onset,the house edge is typically greater, hence paying out even money instead of the typical 3 to 2 onBlackjack. The Dealer also wins on all ties, except for a Blackjack combination.Better still, the player retains the classic benefit of Doubling Down and Splitting, although the latteris only reserved to one time only. Players can expect the Dealer to stand on both hard and soft 17.If you love blackjack in all shapes and forms, you will definitely not want to miss giving this versiona go!

title: European Roulette
description: Roulette's simple but highly attractive gameplay won its deserved popularity among gamblinghouses and saloons which later on transformed into land-based casinos as we know them today.Just try to think up one without a roulette table instantly popping up in the mind. Impossible!Increased chances of winning are what makes the European version of the game stand out fromthe rest of its versions worldwide. Here comes the diversity: unlike its American distant relative,European roulette has only one green pocket marked 0. The numbers layout on the wheel is alsodifferent. What is more to notice, there is a huge space for racetrack bets to add to the generalinside and outside bets: Vousins du Zero, Black Splites, Red Splites and Tiers du Cylindre. Therules are always at hand within the game. Spin the wheel indefinitely  thus a believable theory ofthe roulette's invention during the searches of perpetuum mobile will be proved!

title: Heads and Tails
description: Are you a little on the tired side after having to wrap you headaround Paylines, Scatters, Wilds and Free Rounds? Then settle infor a game that does not stress you with any of that and brings yousheer fun as easy as 1,2... and that's it, there really is no thirdoption.Heads and Tails is pretty self-explanatory: a simple coin flip basedon a game perhaps centuries old. The Heads side of the coin isrepresented by the minted Bitcoin sign, while the Tails sideresembles an ASIC chip on a printed circuit board. Both call backthe origins of Bgaming as pioneers in Bitcoin gaming.Bet amounts can be configured in the settings, therefore the screenis left uncluttered and free of buttons, save for the Heads betbutton on the left-hand side and the Tails bet button respectivelyon the right-hand side.It really does not get simpler that this. The chances are 50/50 here, and each win pays out 1.98Xmaking the house edge as little as 1%. So just toss the coin for big easy wins and tons of fun!

title: Hello Easter
description: Hello Easter video game will get anyone in the Easter spirit, obviously. Time to havefun has come, but just remember, don't spend all the winnings on more chocolate!

title: Hi-Lo Switch
description: Hi-Lo really does not get any simpler than the name suggests. In terms of game rules, it isessentially the coin-flip of card games. And yet the gameplay can be extremely addictive,especially the more wins you get.The player is dealt 3 cards and the goal is to predict, using any of the 3 cards, whether the nextcard from the deck is going to be higher or lower in value than the one selected. Clear and simple,right? Of course it is.The payout depends entirely on the probability of the next card being higher or lower, with the oddslocated directly on the playing field. Let's not forget the name of the game involves Switch, whichrefers you have the chance to re-shuffle and get 3 new cards on which to wager the outcome.Just keep in mind: the higher the probability, the lower the payout. So it makes sense tooccasionally wager against the odds. Oh and don't forget: the same value card will not end in a tie.So are you up for the challenge of stringing the best winning streak of guessing the odds?

title: Hit The Route
description: Colorful billboards, retro cars and thousands of miles to make dreams come true! It's all about our new journey. We invite you to hit the legendary Route 66. The main street of America - that's what the road was called decades ago - is full of adventures. Connecting stylish Chicago with sunny Los-Angeles, the route passes through the geographical heart of the U.S. BGaming wants you to feel the authentical vibe of the old west.Our new 5x4 machine with free spins and impressive bonuses is going to be your ticket to an unforgettable trip. Don't hesitate and always remember that the main rule of the traveler is to enjoy every moment! So, start the engine, turn up the music and let your passion go! Big winnings aren't far behind!

title: Jacks or Better
description: First videopoker games were already present across casinos in the United States of America in the1970s. Since then the game has become known and loved all over the globe.What makes it significantly different from slot games is that it's a combination of the slot machineexperience and an opportunity to test out your abilities in the game of skill which is poker. You know, noteverything depends on sheer luck!In Draw poker, as Jacks or Better is often referred to, you are dealt a complete hand before the firstround of bets. Choose your bet amount and amount of the Hands available in the round carefully. Youcan develop the Hand later on by drawing other cards, i.e. replacing your current ones. The lowestwinning hand is a pair of Jacks.We really didn't want to design yet another videopoker, so our Jacks or Better game unfolds in amedieval setting, with the castle in the background surrounded by meadows and the sounds of acharming traditional flute. This will undoubtedly add to your enjoyment of the game, and we wish you bestof luck at it!

title: Jogo Do Bicho
description: Never the process of guessing the draw has been so exciting: welcome to Jogo DoBicho, the lottery created exclusively by BGaming to show a fragment of Brazilian culture online.The lottery game escaped right from the Zoo in Rio De Janeiro to its streets a long time ago andnow it can be played, with a little help from us, in each corner of the planet. The game is basedaround the 25 different animals, with each of them representing 4 numbers from 00 to 99. So,for example, the ostrich was 01/02/03/04, the elephant 45/46/47/48, and so on. Whencustomers entered the zoo they purchased a ticket, and the last two digits of the ticketcorresponded to a particular animal. The game rules remained the same to this day, we've made this lottery likable and adrenaline rushing keeping the spirit of the past and present. So,make a bet on a favorite lucky animal or number and feel all the emotion of the draw.

title: Lucky Dama Muerta
description:
Lucky Dama Muerta brings the dead to life (in this 5x3 slot)! Fun and vibrant symbols, music that sets the scene and features such as unlimited Free Spins, Wild Multipliers and Gamble rounds promises rewards that will make all turn in their graves! 

In this 5x3 slot game more than just the deceased return from the afterlife, it’s packed with colourful characters, features and exciting rewards. Celebrating death can’t be a more spectacular affair with piñatas, calaveras, vihuelas and the Lucky Dama Muerta herself.

The beautiful Dama Muerta is your lucky and WILD symbol, substituting any symbols in a line except the Scatter to complete a winning combination. All winnings obtained from the WILD symbols are multiplied by 2x.
The piñata is the Scatter Symbol, catch 3, 4 or 5 of these and it will rain sweet rewards by triggering 15 Free Spins. Free spins can be endless, retrigger more with as little as 3 Scatter symbols on any position. You are in for a sweet treat, all Free Spin winnings are tripled!
 
The Gamble round offers players an opportunity to double the fun and their winnings by guessing the colour or suite of the cards.
 
Come celebrate life with Mexican-flair in this 10-payline game packed with exciting winning chances!

title: Lucky Lady's Clover
description: Lucky lady clover is a slot with 5 reels and 9 paylines based on the theme of magic symbols.Alongside with standard letters and numbers, it depicts four - leaved clover, golden coin, rainbow,lucky horseshoe, pot with golden coins, magician hat, and fairy. It offers a variety of bonusesincluding 15 free spins triggered by 3 or more Scatters and Wilds doubling the winnings.

title: Lucky Lady Moon
description: When the sun goes below the horizon and the dark comes around, the majestic moon becomes the lady of the night. Have you ever heard that it has a special energy and magic power? Lucky Lady Moon is here to prove it!A 5x3 slot machine with alluring graphics and music creates a world hiding a lot of surprises. The game includes unlimited Free Spins, Wild Multiplier and a Gamble round to increase your winnings! Catch the magnetic vibes of the night and find all the treasures of Lucky Lady Moon!

title: Lucky Sweets
description: Do you ever dream of a freshly baked tiramisu or a glazed sweet roll? We know you do. Perhapsyour appetite is yearning for a cupcake and a French brioche, too? Well, now you can have themall at the same time as part of an entertaining and user-friendly Lucky Sweets video slot.Take in the simple pleasures of life and its sweet treats while basking in the sun by the Seine.Designed to be a purely relaxing experience, Lucky Sweets is meant for the gastro-connoisseursand bon vivants alike. The 5-reel non-progressive slot with 5 payout combinations comes sansScatters and Wilds. It is as scrumptious as it is simple.The icing on the cake is a Simple card-guessing Gamble Round that amplifies your taste buds andanticipation with a mouth-watering chance to double your winnings up.Enjoy the luscious taste of victory with Lucky Sweets!

title: Mechanical Clover
description: Could you imagine modern devices powered by steam? Weird, right? Futuristic, yet retro at the same time, steampunk is truly one of a kind. Created about 30 years ago, it was inspired by the Victorian era and turned into an alternate reality where technological progress is based not on electricity, but on steam. The unique elements of the steampunk can be found in literature, fashion, cinema, and, of course, games! You’ve probably already guessed… BGaming takes on the steampunk style!

title: Mechanical Orange
description: Mechanical Orange with its retro elements will take you to the alternative world of great beauty:quaint, old, nostalgic in combination with surprisingly bright colors. With anachronistic invention as thecentral symbol of the game players can totally get into the steampunk fantasy, along with finely craftedand visually appealing details and characters of the game - professor and his daughter. The slot ispresented in the form of the orange slice, has 3 reels and 1 payline, available to play on any deviceseven with a portrait mode on. It's not just magic with symbols appearing out of the slot, it is ultimatelyfantastical to actually make spins. Escape and enjoy the alternate story filled with excitement andeccentric characters!

title: Million Joka Fruits
description: Millions of wins, millions of fruits, millions of bright moments - a new and yet so familiar slot is ready to shine on your screen once again, get ready for Million Joka Fruits. A familiar slot full of surprises, want to become rich as a leader of the banana republic? Then it’s high time to jump into this pool of great features and colorful symbols. Take a sip of this magnificent tropical cocktail seasoned with tremendous winnings.

title: Minesweeper
description: "Walk softly" could be the motto of Minesweeper, a casual game by Bgaming. In fact it is a variationof a well-known timekiller-procrastinator computer game but this one can really bring some benefitsto an experienced sapper. Recollect all your skills and tune up the sensors! No reels, no cards thistime. Just a lined green field hovering over the abyss and bombs distributed all over somewhere inthe grass. Each step leads either to an explosion or to a clear block marked with a red flag. Makeyour way through the field step-by-step, maneuvering around the hidden bombs and multiply yourwinnings with each safe move. The game can be adjusted to your personal luck levels: field sizesvary from tiny 2X3 to big 6X15. Bet amounts are configurable as well. The gameplay is simple yetabsorbing: proceed to the opposite end of the playfield and try not to blow yourself up. However, thedesign and the sounds are so cool that even losing is fun here! Check out the juicy BOOM and thelight smoke going up should you land on a mine. Minesweeper definitely stands out in Bgaming's portfolio of slots and card games and is absolutely worth trying if you are nostalgic about thosehours spent in vain playing the original version. Choose the winning path, but remember: sappernever makes two mistakes!

title: Miss Cherry Fruits
description:
Well-designed fruit slots are never enough! BGaming is delighted to add one more traditional-style game to its collection! The brand’s new title Miss Cherry Fruits surprises players with fresh gorgeous graphics and impressive features!

20 lines hidden in the slot are paid both from left to right and from right to left! At the same time, Wild symbols dropped on the reels always expand occupying upper and lower spots and gifting one respin which can be re-triggered up to 3 times!

title: Multihand Blackjack
description: Blackjack is by far the most popular casino card game also known as twenty-one. Regardless ofthe simplicity of the game rules it boasts high winning chances and a great deal of excitement.With 6 decks, 52 cards each, this game is played against the House, with one of the Dealer's cardsface down at the start.Players are able to split their hand upon initial dealing, provided they receive the same card value.This gives them the chance to make a foray with up to three hands playable. Should the total valueof the initial cards be equal to 9, 10 or 11, the player will be prompted to double their bet for achance to shoot for an even higher win. In any scenario the Dealer will stand on either a soft orhard 17.Playing against the House grants a 1:1 chance of winning and a 3:2 pay on Blackjack. Push ordraw returns the original bet.The subtle tones, smooth card and chip animations, and relaxing music make this the go-to cardgame for all blackjack aficionados.

title: Oasis Poker
description: The Oasis Poker is not to be confused with the Caribbean Stud Poker (we have a game for that aswell, don't you worry!). It has its origin from the traditional player versus player type, but here youcan play against the house with just the same efficiency.In the beginning of the round, after placing the bet on the Ante, you receive all five cards face up atonce, while the Dealer exposes one of their cards.What makes it similar to the Caribbean Poker is that you're able to discard the cards you wouldn't want for your Hand, and replace them with, hopefully, something better from a standard 52-carddeck. This can be done with a fee of the single Ante bet.If you like Poker in all its variety of rules and variations, why not take pleasure in a relaxing round of Oasis Poker!

title: Platinum Lightning
description: This 25 paylines slot features figures from theAncient Greek mythology and is packed withspecial features which make the game moreattractive to the users: scatters which multiplywinnings by total bets, wild symbols, bonuses,free spins and a gambling round.Grab hold of the all-powerful Zeus LightningScatter. A combination of 3, 4 and 5 Boltsmultiply winnings by x7, x77 and x777 inascending order. Sail the high winds with theGreek galley, an ancient ship, that is the Wild. AWild can substitute any symbol, but for theScatter, amplifying wins by the x88, x888 and x8888 as well. The Minotaur is a ferocious sticky reelbonus that, when appearing on reels 1 and 5, triggers 10 free spins.Borrowing from the Ancient and recent folklore of Greece, the games catchy Sirtaki music is boundto stay with you long after you stop playing. Enjoy meeting the Pantheon of Gods and Heroes aswell as the gifts they have to offer with Platinum Lightning!

title: Platinum Lightning Deluxe
description: The slot game is based on the motifs of ancient Greek mythology.The main heroes of the game are heroes and gods of Greece -Hercules, Themis, Medusa and others.Greek mythology has had an extensive influence on the culture,arts, and literature of Western civilization and remains part ofEuropean heritage and language. From ancient times to thepresent numerous poets and artists have been seekinginspiration in Greek mythology and bringing it to theirmasterpieces of today.

title: Plinko
description: Welcome to Plinko - BGaming version of the casual game with high winning odds. Plinko is a mix ofarcade games and online gaming: resembles pinball or the Japanese pachinko game, the basicprinciple has much in common with these ones. The player receives the payouts with thecorresponding coefficients. The size of the win depends on the hole the ball falls into. The game isincredibly simple and does not require special skills. During the game Plinko, the trajectory of theball can't be affected, there are no strategies for this game.

title: Pontoon
description: Pontoon is the ultimate version of Blackjack for the more experienced player. This British variety hasa somewhat modified rulebook as opposed to the classic version of Blackjack.Played with 8 decks and 52 cards each, the player does not, in fact, see the Dealer's hand up untilthey finish the first round. Pontoon, another term for blackjack, is the traditional ace and face cardcombination that pays 2 to 1. However, players have the added chance of scoring a Five Card Trick,a sum 5 cards in a hand not exceeding 21, which automatically grants a similar 2 to 1 win.Unlike in its traditional counterpart, in Pontoon the dealer has to hit on 16 and a soft 17. Bear in mindthat should the game round end in a tie, the dealer shall be the winner.If you are a newcomer to Blackjack, it might make sense to try the classic version or BlackjackSurrender first. What if you're up for the new challenge? Then wait no more, double down on yourskill and strategy in Pontoon!

title: Princess of Sky
description: Princess of Sky is a full HD 5-reel 9 payline slot based on thetraditional tale of princess and her fairy kingdom. With the fabpalace behind the reels and white pigeons in the sky, the slotcreates a true atmosphere of the medieval fairy tale. It ispacked with the glittering symbols of jewels, diamond rings,roses, gift boxes, golden crowns, and magic keys. It alsobrings a lot of magic to the scene: the blond Scatter princesstriggering bonus free spins and the Wild ruby heartsubstituting any symbol to complete the winning combination.

title: Princess Royal
description: Princess Royal is a slot with 5 reels and 9 paylines based on the theme of luxury lifestyle of royalty.Alongside with standard letters and numbers, it depicts four - leaved clover ring, gold withdiamantes horseshoe, ruby heart, luxury car, smart hotel, gold crown, and a gorgeous princess. Itoffers a variety of bonuses including 15 free spins triggered by 3, 4 or 5 Scatters and Wildsdoubling the winnings.

title: Road 2 Riches
description:
Full of adventures, sometimes dangerous, but still alluring, Route 66 invites you to start your journey to riches! The main street of America, leading to full life Chicago, has always attracted travelers who are looking for vivid impressions and, of course
, big money. Inspired by the legend, BGaming presents its brand new
Road2Riches slot!
The HD graphics of the slot along with energetic music brings excitement and lead to great winnings! With a 5x4 scheme and 50 winning lines, Road2Riche
s surprises players with a set of features such as three kinds of Jackpots, suddenly appearing Mystery Wilds, and Free Spins that can be retriggered! Moreover, you can manage your luck with the Buy Bonus feature! If you are daring enough, join the breathtaking adventure with BGaming!

title: Rocket Dice
description: Dice is one of the famous and ancient games. It appeared long time ago, the principle of the gamestayed almost unchanged. The tools of the game are the dices (bones). The dice has six playingfaces, which are numbered from 1 to 6. During the game the dices are rolled, then the points arecalculated, which determine the winner.The goal of the game Rocket dice - to guess if the number that will drop is bigger or smaller the onechosen by the player. Two dices are used in the game. The player makes a bet, chooses over or under and the desired number, after he makes a throw. If the player guessed well, he wins.

title: Scratch Dice
description: Scratch Dice is a mobile-first game of luck by Bgaming. A fusion of dice and instant lottery, thisgame has been designed to deliver a bit of elegant simplicity into the gambling process.The rules are simple enough to get you in the game immediately. There are lottery tickets withscratch zone and dice symbols under it. Clear the scratch zone to reveal the dice.A combination of 3 identical symbols (1-1-1 to 6-6-6) brings instant winnings, while a consequent setof symbols (1-2-3 to 4-5-6) is called Street and opens a Golden Ticket. This special one introduceshigher multipliers in case of a winning combination.The game is all about how it feels. The HD graphics, matching music and sounds, bright colors andvery natural scratching process all make gameplay really enjoyable.We recommend playing Scratch Dice on your mobile touchscreen device and clear the scratch zonewith your finger  just the way you would do with a real instant lottery. If tired of scratching, there is aReveal feature that clears the ticket for you. The funny thing is that it imitates your own scratchingstyle!Try it. It's fun. We guarantee!

title: Scroll of Adventure
description: Scroll of Adventure is a slot with 5 reels and 5 paylines based on the traditional Egyptian theme ofPharaohs treasure hunting. Alongside standard slot symbols which are all presented in anauthentic Egyptian font, the game also depicts mask of Tutankhamun's mummy, ancient papyrusscroll, winged goddess Isis, dung beetles and treasure thief. It offers a variety of bonuses including10 free spins triggered by 3 or more Scatters.

title: Sic Bo
description: Sic Bo originates from the games of chance invented in China and went a long way from traditionaldicing to the table game that decorates today land-based casinos worldwide. Sic Bo has trulyentered the digital age nowadays and BGaming is keeping up with current online gaming trends,that's why it has created an updated version of online Sic Bo with all its amusing and interestingaspects. Sic Bo comes with a lot of risky bets, and the betting options are formed by the variouscombinations obtained with three dice. Wagers per game are made on as many combinations asyou want. The likable thing is the lightening of the winning table combinations made for betterunderstanding of the game results. Also the odds, big payouts are the other great thing of Sic Bo.Anyway, you'll never know unless you try, so there is no sense in time wasting, try your luck and rollthe dice!

title: Sic Bo Macau
description: Sic Bo Macau is a dice game originated from China and is considered to be a precursorof Craps. BGaming created Sic Bo Macau version with colorful backgrounds and wonderfulsound effects which are always thought trough based on the theme of the game. Every singlewinning in this game is incredibly awesome. The main difference between Sic Bo AtlanticVersion and Macau is that in the latter the even/odd bet is available, but it is essentially thesame thing as the small/big bet in that it only loses against triples of one number (other than itsopposite, of course) and, therefore, has the same house edge as the even/odd bet. As manybets as wanted can be placed at the same time, provided that their total sum does not exceedthe maximum allowed. The winning betting areas are highlighted for convenience.

title: Slotomon Go
description: Slotomon Go is a slot with fun take on your beloved pocket monsters with vivid animations andmemorable characters. You don't have to walk for miles to catch your favourite Slotomon, here youjust spin the reels to discover each one's unique personality and animation. Each little monstercarries its own multiplier and is ready to reward your playing experience with fun and wins.

title: Slottica Bonanza
description: Tired of a boring gray everyday life that haunts you time after time? Ignite the fire of bright emotions with the new exciting Blaze Bonanza slot! The new design, made in fiery colors with tongues of flame, will certainly create an atmosphere of a real flame burning in the winners hearts! Inside you will find a raging whirlwind of great features, colorful symbols and numerous winnings! Immerse yourself in the flames of fantastic moments with Blaze Bonanza!

title: Spin and Spell
description: BGaming inspired by the spookiest night of the year created a special video slot - Spin and Spell.The game has with 5x3 scheme and 20 paylines. This Halloween themed slot features all thosefamous symbols related to Halloween such as pumpkins, bats and black cats, witches and hauntedcastles, while there are lots of features to enjoy such as free spins, expanding wild, special bonusgames to award plenty of winning opportunities while you make the most of ghostly night. Thegraphics, music and effects will really make anyone feel like it is all hallows eve.

title: Texas Hold`em
description: Casino variation of Texas Hold'em Poker is derived from a classic poker game played in pokerrooms worldwide. However, unlike poker rooms the game is played against the dealer, whichprevents any forfeiting and bluffing. As for the course of the game, it consists of the conventionalpoker betting stages: Preflop, Flop, Turn and River and features the options of folding, calling,betting and raising.Texas Hold'em is one of the most dramatic and popular variations of poker in the world with a widevariety of strategies. Texas Hold'em typically accommodates up to 10 players, but here you playagainst the dealer.

title: Trey Poker
description: Trey Poker is another poker game in the Bgaming family. This variant of the world's renowned cardgame actually includes two different options: Pair Up and Ante.Pair Up is a simple draw and win type of game where the player is dealt 3 cards, with high hopesthere will be a pair or better on the hand. The result of the current deal is revealed instantly, sincethe player sees the entire hand immediately.Ante is a more Poker-style game mode where the player is put against the dealer. Each party isdealt 3 cards and the one who has a better hand wins. Once dealt, the player evaluates the handand either folds to end the round or plays, in which case the playe's hand is compared with thedealer's. Whoever collects a stronger hand wins.Since there are only 3 cards dealt per round, combinations collected in a hand are valued a bitdifferent than in more common poker variations: Straight pays out higher than Flush and Three of aKind beats them both.Trey Poker by Bgaming is a "blitz" card game for those who think fast or would love to trainthemselves to!

title: WBC Ring of Riches
description: BGaming strives to bring sport-themed slots to the next level of entertainment! We launch the new slot in association with the World Boxing Council! Meet WBC Ring of Riches!

title: West Town
description: West Town is a traditional western-themed slot. It gets the players to the most iconic times in theAmerican history. The game depicts different Wild West symbols, like sheriff's badge, guns, boxeswith gold coins, glass of whiskey, Wanted-sticker, bandit, Joker and playing card symbols. Unlikein many slot games, the card symbols make a lot of sense here, as poker is a common theme inwesterns

title: YYY Million
description: Buckle up rocketman and let’s go seek fortune around the stardust! Be ready to join us on a new journey across the universe-divine with YYY Million. Refreshed design with cosmic thematics, all well-known symbols wrapped in new spectacular graphics. All familiar features like expanded wilds and gamble rounds will assist you in this journey as well. The algorithm of pleasantly spent time is simple - enjoy catchy music, play the slot and get your wins!
